edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.expr.cnf

Class CnfFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.expr.cnf.CnfFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BooleanExpressionFactory

    public class CnfFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements BooleanExpressionFactory
    A CNF factory is an implementation of BooleanExpressionFactory that works by putting all boolean expressions into a conjunctive normal form.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.Boolean simplify
      Whether or not Functions check for instances of (p || !p) A value of False will increase performance

      • setBooleanExpressionSimplification

        public void setBooleanExpressionSimplification(boolean value)
        Description copied from interface: BooleanExpressionFactory
        Allows CnfFactory to simplify expensive (p || !p) expressions as they are created. Default is false. Setting to true will decrease performance in certain CnfFactory methods.
        Specified by:
        setBooleanExpressionSimplification in interface BooleanExpressionFactory

      • getBooleanExpressionSimplification

        Returns:
